name: vercel-ecommerce-store
description: Microservices-based e-commerce platform built with Node.js (Express) and PostgreSQL (single DB), initially hosted on Vercel. Includes API Gateway, Auth, Product, Cart, Order, Payment, Discount, Admin, and Notification services. React + TypeScript frontend with full shopping flow, admin panel, and modern UI.

scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
